channel.title: Rune and addy
channel.description: Alright, so, heres my question. Will you add rune/addy items into shops? For example the heroes guild, it has a short sword, a chain and legs in it, all rune in rsc. Here'd be my suggestion: don't add any addy or rune items.

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:37, topic:422951”][quote author=The Enforcer link=topic=525611.msg3834881#msg3834881 date=1322824042]
OMFG put this thing up already.
[/quote]Oh but we woulnd’t want everyone to spend the christmas training strength would we?[/quote]Going to be honest, I’d do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I think it should be a full replica… maybe at most adding a few more quests for the dragon slayer quest to take place. Why? Because rsc was about adventure, no guides… no help just plain straight adventure and you learned as you progressed. It took me forever to finish the quests for the rune shop and I mean forever because I did not know anything. Since I have all the quests in my memory the second time around it will be easier to get myself into a position where I can take advantage.

Replicated or slightly adjusted… I would go with a replica…If you leave it for only smithers… then people who smith dominate the market. Jagex did a great job with their economy. If you want to altar something do not only look at the positive side but more importantly the negative side.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

Either you expressed yourself wrong or you are backpedaling cause that sounds a whole lot different then what was on the original post.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:32, topic:422951”]Oh dear, this is way off topic, either that or I expressed myself wrong.
The point I was making that you should be able to get CERTAIN rune items from the guild south of varrock without having 33 qp.
As for the plate, shouldn’t be in the game until dragonslayer is implemented.
Just my 2 cents.[/quote]The shop only has certain rune items in it… The only useful items in there are chain and legs.

Also, it should be smithable, but not wearable.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

Oh dear, this is way off topic, either that or I expressed myself wrong.
The point I was making that you should be able to get CERTAIN rune items from the guild south of varrock without having 33 qp.
As for the plate, shouldn’t be in the game until dragonslayer is implemented.
Just my 2 cents.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:30, topic:422951”]Maybe I am not understanding the problem…? Trading is fine… are you guys saying that people should not be able to trade the rune items in the shop? The plate is the only item in there that requires the quest completion… and if people want to complete the quest and merch the items allow them to do so… why not? And my memory is off so like 35 or 36 qp no argument.[/quote]They want to delay the point in which addy/rune becomes available to players longer. Essentially forcing people to get smithing up before they can get the armor, which will cause an temporary inflation of the prices (until more people can smith it or it goes in the shops) and create a massive advantage to no-lifers that started first.

The only reason why that works for RuneScape is because there is a constant flow of new items, and this temporary inflation is switched to new items before the old one crashes.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Maybe I am not understanding the problem…? Trading is fine… are you guys saying that people should not be able to trade the rune items in the shop? The plate is the only item in there that requires the quest completion… and if people want to complete the quest and merch the items allow them to do so… why not? And my memory is off so like 35 or 36 qp no argument.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:28, topic:422951”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=525611.msg3833781#msg3833781 date=1322762914]

Is it ‘bought’ or ‘used’? Again, I thought you could buy/sell them all you wanted, just not use them until you get to 33 quest points.
[/quote]You could trade them no matter what, just not use them.

Well only the plate… not the other rune items. We could also add an attachment to the npc to check the quest points >= 33 in order to buy them (after all you need 33 to get into the location)[/quote]You could trade them among other players. You could also make them through smithing.

You needed to actually complete the dragon slayer quest. To start it you needed 33 quest points, and you got 2-3 from doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If you are really that afraid of ‘noclipping’, how about a simple quest point check whenever accessing that particular rune-selling store?

Or, at least in RS2, you couldn’t even use rune-plates from other players without the right number of quest points I think, so wouldn’t it just be implemented there?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:20, topic:422951”][quote author=nacional link=topic=525611.msg3832478#msg3832478 date=1322688157]
let’s take out npcs so people can’t bot…
seems like a drastic measure for something so minimal.
[/quote][quote author=sw0o0sh link=topic=525611.msg3832527#msg3832527 date=1322691259]
Jagex couldn’t get rid of botting but they did a pretty good job at removing them via flagging software rather than having mini-police running around.
[/quote]What does botting have to do with this topic?[/quote]

I was just making a point. To show that removing the items all together in fear of someone “illegally” accessing them would be like
removing all npcs so noone can bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:16, topic:422951”]Point being, nothing is impossible with computers.
Yes, even flying.[/quote]I don’t think you understand how programs work… If I check the paths, and positions of the characters at every point there is no way for them to no-clip.

When you write an application you create a ‘web’ of logic, and everything conforms to it; the behavior isn’t arbitrary and random.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune and addy
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:14, topic:422951”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=525611.msg3832025#msg3832025 date=1322643304]

[quote author=NoLives link=topic=525611.msg3832004#msg3832004 date=1322637222]

[quote author=sw0o0sh link=topic=525611.msg3831847#msg3831847 date=1322626829]
What is the mission statement of this project? If it’s to capture the original experience, why wouldn’t it be added?
[/quote]Alright, lets say their trying to replica, they add it, noone can enter without 33 quest points.
Someone will find a bug to noclip, they get rune items as soon as they get money.
[/quote]How would they noclip? The only base that’s had that issue is demonik…
[/quote]And I’m sure demonik thought nothing like that was possible.[/quote]Why would he have thought that? He did nothing server-side to stop it, or even check the positioning.

Read full topic
